Text:
Thanks JW.

My money says maria has 5 cats.

..at least 5...

Is anyone else having problems with TPB. My anti-virus software has found viruses just by going into the site, not ever downloading anything. And you I can't upload anything.

I've not had the virus problems you describe, but have had a few other problems. Mostly I've had a problem with pop-ups, but had a devil of a time 2 weeks back when an exploit in an older version of Acrobat was utilized to tunnel through and drop a f'n piece of of hostageware and execute it.

It disabled my A/V and kept taking me to their home site so that I'd 'have to' buy a key to unlock their f'n software and give me back control of my computer.

I Googled the name of the hostageware 'anti-virus' and lo and behold I was able to clean out the problem myself. Filled the APPDATA folder with literally hundreds of .exes that were self-replicating... which in turn screwed up several Windows folders and messed the registry. Took my about 45 minutes to clean everything up. I feel sorry about those who automatically paid for the key.

I still get a shitload of portscans from the same 6 IPs. Oddly enough my A/V reports everything's clean, anti-trojan reports everything's clean, no rootkits, nothing showing but every once in a while when I go into the APPDATA folder the firewall lights up.

What virii is your A/V showing?

the site is buggy lately

i havent seen any viruses though, but they could be lurking about

thunderbum

that virus is called "vundo" and it's one of the really annoying ones

vundofix should do the trick if you encounter it next time

AVG antivirus lists The Pirate Bay as "Risky: This page contains the potential for active threat delivery". But that doesn't stop me.... never did, never will. 

Carry on JW you are a modern day patriot.
AVG is a shitty anti-virus used by noobs only.
You rock J, thanks a lot!!

Velvet, in your infinite wisdom, perhaps you could share your AV insight. I only recently started using AVG after experience with Norton, Mcafee, Panda, Kaspersky to name a few. IMO they're pretty much all the same, just packaged differently.

Yes, I NEVER go on the piratebay without Adblock Plus running on Firefox.  Never come here on internet explorer.  This place is LOADED with garbage that will infect your computer.  Thanks for the up, jwhitt.

Does anyone besides those who seem incapable of learning how installing software even use IE anymore?  I think most of us have at least one relative like this.  You know the type.  They always seem to be calling for help with their computer but seem incapable of following the advice given.  :p
